msbt.message: I had a dream that me and you climbed a mountain! In the dark! At the top was a couch. We sat and ate snacks and watched the sun come up. It was real chill and fun.
I've been itching to write you a card ever since I woke up this morning! Actually...I've been itching ever since I woke up this morning!

Were you wearing your clothes backwards the other day, or were you walking backwards?
Either way, it was real neat, man.

I like sending postcards to friends.
Should I write more?
What did you have for dinner last night? Will ya have it again tonight? Can I have some? I'll bring my own plate.
Did you know that books are just a buncha letters? And there's only, um, I gotta count... OK! There's only 104 letters. How do they make such big books with that few letters?

Isn't this postcard pretty? I don't want to cover it up with too much of my writing, because I think it is pretty and I should let you see it. That is why I am only writing a few words and then I am done.
I like writing letters because it makes me think about how my grandma wrote letters before people quit writing letters. Write a letter, ! Be like my grandma!
Do you like how this postcard smells? I dipped it in gravy, then licked the gravy off and sent it to you!

It's time for a riddle!
What did the cake say while cutting an onion?
